medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr. ___ initially presented for weakness and lack of energy. He was admitted for CHF and CKD management and improved with diuresis. On an unspecified date, he complained of sudden onset abdominal pain. A CT abdomen/pelvis showed free air and perforated viscus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: CHF (EF 20%), CKD, SCLC (off chemo), A fib (not on anticoagulation), COPD, hypothyroidism, DVT, HTN, history of appendectomy.
